headline: Baxter is First Manufacturer to Achieve Gold Resiliency Badge for IV Solutions, Nutrition Solutions and Premix Drugs from Healthcare Industry Resilience Collaborative (HIRC)
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., September 26, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a leading global medtech company, today announced that it has been awarded a Gold Level Resiliency Badge from the Healthcare Industry Resilience Collaborative (HIRC) in the categories of IV Solutions, Nutrition Solutions and Premix Drugs. Baxter is the first manufacturer to earn this distinction across these categories, underscoring Baxter’s commitment to building a stronger, more reliable supply chain.
